name: Vitaliy Yasenivskyy
label: Software Engineer
summary: Driven and solutions-oriented software engineer with a proven ability to excel both independently and as part of a team. Passionate about designing and building robust full-stack web applications, with a strong commitment to continuous learning and mastering new technologies. Experienced in architecting, developing, and maintaining scalable back-end API services

highlights: Developed a custom product listing generator for Amazon and Overstock.Automated backend processes and optimized workflows using Python libraries (Pandas, Tkinter, PyMySQL)

projects.title: Equity Watchlist
projects.summary: Replicates Yahoo Finance watchlist functionality. Built using Flask API, PyMySQL, MySQL, React.js, Material UI, React Select, HTML, and CSS.

projects.title: Ishikawa Diagram
projects.summary: Dynamic and responsive fishbone diagram generator for JSON data using React.js and HTML Canvas

projects.title: NurseAssignment Tool
projects.summary: Group project automating nurse-patient assignments based on location. Built using React.js (Google Map API), Python, SQLite3

degrees: 26-week full-stack Python and JavaScript immersive program

skills.name: JavaScript, React.js, MySQL, MongoDB, HTML, CSS, Jinja2

references.name: Eric Hall, CEO/Principal StellarDimensions LLC
references.reference: Vitaliy has shown excellent skills as a application developer. He has a remarkable and elegant style to his coding that often provides solutions that are both useful and scalable.
